name: Endless Runner - Parkour City
description:
Get ready to expeirence a world of good pixel art backgrounds and fast paced action gameplay while you fight to get the highest score in the Game PARKOUR CITY

Parkour city is a retro, hypercasual, fast paced 2D sidesroller game, made for android, inspired by Canabalt. 

Controls:

Press screen to jump and hold to jump higher.
